title: eWallet
description: Aims to perform operations like a real e-wallet applications like PayTM. Transfer funds from one user to another, deposit and withdraw funds from external banks.

title: Sway
description: Streamline access to educational content from YouTube. Users can search for topics that they want to study, and the app will provide curated subtopics with relevant YouTube videos.

title: ARC - MSI
description: Developed a web app for the Alumni Relations Cell of Maharaja Surajmal Institute, Delhi, showcasing events, teams, and galleries using React.js, Tailwind CSS.

title: Melius - MSI
description: Created a portfolio for Melius - Consulting and Analytics Club, Delhi, displaying teams, events, and projects with a user-friendly interface using React.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: SpaceX
description: Developed a UI clone of 'spacex.com' using raw CSS and JavaScript. Created interactive and visually appealing animations to closely match the official 'spacex.com' site.
